title: New York by Knight
description: THE STREETS OF MANHATTAN...WHERE DRAGONS WALK BY NIGHTNow the showdown has begun. On a planet called Earth and the city known as New York, knight and dragon confront each other in one final battle. As the deathly dance begins, the city of asphalt and steel slowly wakes to the magic in its midst. Beneath the streets the tattered subway dwellers meet in secret convocation to worship the Dragon as God. In Spanish Harlem a young boy is apprenticed to a great warrior. On Fifth Avenue hardened cabbies tremble as a Nightmare parades the streets. And in St. Patrick's Cathedral the Dragon takes control of the greatest city on Earth....
author: Esther M. Friesner
